        public static Payer getGovernmentPayer(java.lang.String governmentPayerName)
        Returns the government payer with the given name.
        Parameters:
        governmentPayerName - the government payer to get.
        Returns:
        returns null if the government payer does not exist.

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clear the list of loaded and cached Payers. Currently only used in tests.

      • findPayer

        public static Payer findPayer(Person person,
                              HealthRecord.EncounterType service,
                              long time)
        Returns a Payer that the person can qualify for.
        Parameters:
        person - the person who needs to find insurance.
        service - the EncounterType the person would like covered.
        time - the time that the person requires insurance.
        Returns:
        a payer who the person can accept and vice versa.

      • accepts

        public boolean accepts(Person person,
                       long time)
        Returns whether a payer will accept the given patient at this time. Currently returns true by default, except for Medicare/Medicaid which have hardcoded requirements.
        Parameters:
        person - Person to consider
        time - Time the person seeks care
        Returns:
        whether or not the payer will accept this patient as a customer

      • coversService

        public boolean coversService(java.lang.String service)
        Returns whether the payer covers the given service.
        Parameters:
        service - the entry type to check
        Returns:
        whether the payer covers the given service

      • isInNetwork

        public boolean isInNetwork(Provider provider)
        Is the given Provider in this Payer's network?. Currently just returns true until Networks are implemented.
        Parameters:
        provider - Provider to consider
        Returns:
        whether or not the provider is in the payer network

      • coversCare

        public boolean coversCare(HealthRecord.Entry entry)
        Returns whether or not this payer will cover the given entry.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry that needs covering.

      • determineCopay

        public double determineCopay(HealthRecord.Entry entry)
        Determines the copay owed for this Payer based on the type of entry. For now, this returns a default copay. But in the future there will be different copays depending on the encounter type covered. If the entry is a wellness visit and the time is after the mandate year, then the copay is $0.00.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to calculate the copay for.

      • adjustClaim

        public double adjustClaim(Claim.ClaimEntry claimEntry,
                          Person person)
        Determines whether or not this payer will adjust this claim, and by how much. This determination is based on the claim adjustment strategy configuration, which defaults to none.
        Parameters:
        claimEntry - The claim entry to be adjusted.
        person - The person making the claim.
        Returns:
        The dollar amount the claim entry was adjusted.

      • payMonthlyPremium

        public double payMonthlyPremium()
        Pays the given premium to the Payer, increasing their revenue.
        Returns:
        the monthly premium amount.

      • incrementCustomers

        public void incrementCustomers(Person person)
        Increments the number of unique users.
        Parameters:
        person - the person to add to the payer.

      • incrementCoveredEntries

        public void incrementCoveredEntries(HealthRecord.Entry entry)
        Increments the entries covered by this payer.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry covered.

      • incrementUncoveredEntries

        public void incrementUncoveredEntries(HealthRecord.Entry entry)
        Increments the entries not covered by this payer.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry covered.

      • addCoveredCost

        public void addCoveredCost(double costToPayer)
        Increases the total costs incurred by the payer by the given amount.
        Parameters:
        costToPayer - the cost of the current encounter, after the patient's copay.

      • addUncoveredCost

        public void addUncoveredCost(double costToPatient)
        Increases the costs the payer did not cover by the given amount.
        Parameters:
        costToPatient - the costs that the payer did not cover.

      • addQols

        public void addQols(double qols)
        Adds the Quality of Life Score (QOLS) of a patient of the current (past?) year. Increments the total number of years covered (for averaging out purposes).
        Parameters:
        qols - the Quality of Life Score to be added.

        public double getRevenue()
        Returns the total amount of money recieved from patients. Consists of monthly premium payments.
